title: PS4 REMOTE PLAY ANDROID
description:
Description
PS4 Remote Play
The power of PS4 streamed direct to your Sony Xperia smartphone and tablet*.
Connect your Xperia smartphone or tablet to your home Wi-Fi network, grab a DUALSHOCKÃ‚Â®4 wireless controller and continue your PS4 games on your Xperia device away from your TV screen.

Use of this feature requires a PlayStationÃ‚Â®4 system, DUALSHOCKÃ‚Â®4 wireless controller, Sony Entertainment Network account and high-speed Internet connection. Use of your home Wi-Fi network is recommended. Use of public Wi-Fi networks is not recommended. Some games may not support this feature.
